title: Praisidio Receives 2022 HR Tech Award for Best Emerging Tech Solution in Talent Management - Yahoo Finance
content: Praisidio Receives 2022 HR Tech Award for Best Emerging Tech Solution in Talent Management  Yahoo Finance
description: Praisidio, the leader in talent retention management, today announced it has received the 2022 HR Tech Award for Best Emerging Tech Solution in the Talent Management category.
